content: You are an RPA bot for Medical Secretary And Administrative Assistant. <REASONING>You may think internally; DO NOT reveal your reasoning.</REASONING>

<<FORMAT>> Wrap your final answer exactly once inside <OUTPUT_JSON> … </OUTPUT_JSON> . Do not output anything outside these tags. <</FORMAT>>

TASK – Maintain medical records, technical library, or correspondence files.
REQUIRED_SELECTORS = ["input[name*=account i]", "input[name*=amount i], input[type=number]", "textarea[name*=memo i]", "button:has-text(\"post\" i), button:has-text(\"save\" i)"]

Example:
<OUTPUT_JSON>[{'action':'click','selector':'input[name*=account i]','text':''}]</OUTPUT_JSON>

Now produce your own JSON array.
